section.title: Maintain External Shipping Records
section.para: To maintain external shipping records, select the "Maintain External Shipping Records" option. The following screen will appear:
When maintain external shipping records, you are presented with the following options:
To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating an Account Number, returning you to the previous screen.
Creates the Account Number and adds it to the master list of Account Numbers.
